Title: Scotch® 311+ Clear High Tack Box Sealing Tape (48 mm. x 914 m., 6 Rolls/Case)
Description:
Here's a product description based on the image of a roll of Scotch 311+ packaging tape:

**Scotch® 311+ Packaging Tape - Crystal Clear, Strong Seal**

This roll of Scotch® 311+ packaging tape delivers superior performance and reliability for all your shipping and packaging needs.  Its crystal-clear design allows for easy visibility of the contents, while its strong adhesive provides a secure and long-lasting seal.  Ideal for a wide range of applications, this versatile tape is a must-have for any home or business.

**Key Features:**

* **Crystal Clear:**  See your contents clearly without removing the tape.
* **Strong Adhesive:**  Provides a secure seal that resists tearing and keeps packages closed.
* **Versatile:**  Suitable for a variety of packaging and sealing tasks.
* **Durable:**  Made with high-quality materials for long-lasting performance.
* **Reliable:**  Trusted Scotch® quality you can count on.


**Perfect for:**

* Shipping boxes
* Sealing envelopes
* Bundling items
* General packaging needs


Order your roll of Scotch® 311+ packaging tape today and experience the difference!

Title: TUFflex® Natural Premium Bubble Mailer (9.5 in. x 14 in., 100 Mailers/CS)
Description: Protect your valuable items during shipping with these durable, eco-friendly padded mailers.  Made from sturdy kraft paper, these mailers feature a built-in layer of bubble wrap cushioning to ensure your goods arrive safely.  The simple, clean design is perfect for a professional look, and the convenient self-sealing closure makes packaging quick and easy.  Order your supply of these reliable padded mailers today!

Title: TUFflex® 63 Ga. Cast Yellow Premium Stretch Film (20 in. x 5000 ft., 50 RL/SK)
Description:
**High-Visibility Yellow Stretch Film**

This vibrant yellow stretch film provides superior protection and high visibility for your packaged goods.  Ideal for identifying and securing pallets, bundles, and other shipments, its bright color ensures easy recognition and helps prevent accidental damage or misplacement.  The strong, durable film clings securely, offering excellent protection against moisture, dust, and other environmental factors.  Perfect for warehouse, distribution, and transportation applications where high visibility is crucial.  Order your roll today and experience the difference!

Title: PURELL® Professional Surface Disinfecting Wipes (110 Count Canister, 6/Case)
Description: Keep your surfaces clean and disinfected with Purell Professional Surface Disinfecting Wipes.  This convenient canister contains 110 wipes, each designed to kill 99.9% of bacteria and viruses, including COVID-19 virus, MRSA, *E. coli*, Strep, and Salmonella.  Effective against cold and flu viruses as well.  With a fresh citrus scent and no harsh chemicals, these wipes require no rinsing.  Ideal for homes, offices, and other professional settings.  Wipe dimensions are 7" x 8".

Title: Kimberly-Clark Professional™ ICON™ Cherry Blossom Dispenser (11.5 in. x 7.5 in. x 3.98 in., 1 Dispenser/Case)
Description: Elevate your restroom's aesthetic with the Kimberly-Clark Professional hand towel dispenser.  This stylish dispenser features a sophisticated marble-inspired design with subtle gold accents, adding a touch of elegance to any space.  Its sleek, modern form seamlessly integrates into various decors while ensuring efficient and hygienic hand towel dispensing.  Built for durability and reliability, this dispenser provides a convenient and premium hand drying experience for your guests and employees. Experience the perfect blend of form and function with Kimberly-Clark Professional.

Title: Reliable Brand® Translucent Black Electronic Touch Free Single Roll Towel Dispenser (14.4375 in. x 11.75 in. x 9.125 in., 1 Dispenser/CS)
Description: Upgrade your restroom with the Reliable Black Roll Paper Towel Dispenser.  This stylish and durable dispenser features a sleek, modern black design that complements any décor.  Its robust construction ensures long-lasting performance in high-traffic areas.  The easy-to-load design makes refills quick and simple, minimizing downtime.  Provide your guests with a clean and efficient hand-drying experience with the Reliable Black Roll Paper Towel Dispenser.

Title: 3 3/8x2 1/3 96 Bright White Showcase™ Badge Label 100 SH/BX 1000/CT V03514
Description: Organize your belongings with ease using our **Six-Label Sheet**.  This convenient sheet features six individual, easily detachable labels, perfect for a variety of uses.  Each label provides ample space for clear and concise identification.  Ideal for organizing storage boxes, labeling jars and containers, or creating personalized gift tags.  The perforated edges ensure clean and effortless separation.  Simply print, peel, and stick!  Get organized today!

Title: 6 3/4 Remittance Veritiv Seville® 24# White Wove OSSS 500/Hard BX 3000/CT V04932
Description: Introducing our sleek and professional **#10 Euro Flap Envelope**.  This envelope features a classic Euro flap design for a sophisticated touch, perfect for business correspondence, invitations, or personal letters. The clean, minimalist design allows your message to take center stage.  High-quality paper stock ensures durability and a premium feel.  Order yours today and elevate your mailing experience.
